room_title: Escape room "Shadow Menagerie" by Hall Of Shadows Escape Games in Redlands
room_address: 320 N E St B110 San Bernardino, CA 92401
room_description: You and your team will be dispatched into an abandoned storage facility where an oddball assortment of objects have been collected… objects that seem to defy the very laws of nature. All of these items have a dark, sorted history and are believed to be possessed by paranormal forces. These objects have remained safely contained for decades, but are now beginning to grow “restless” . It will be up to you to find a way to keep this dangerous collection secure before these dark forces are unleashed upon the Earth.
